welcome.title: Welcome to Slack Coder!
welcome.hint: Send a message to start a conversation, or use the buttons below:

session.no_sessions_found: No {agent} sessions found for this directory
session.start_new_hint: Start a new conversation to create a session.
session.resume_hint: Reply below to continue the conversation
session.session_resumed_detail:
Directory: {directory}

You can now continue the conversation in this thread.

diff.gist_created: Gist created, click the button to view:

errors.failed_open_modal: Failed to open dialog. Please try again.
errors.path_not_directory: Path exists but is not a directory: {path}
errors.agent_not_configured: Agent {agent} is not configured. Make sure the CLI is installed and environment variables are set.
errors.codex_not_found: Codex CLI not found. Please install it or set CODEX_CLI_PATH.

modal.new_cwd_hint: Use absolute path (e.g., /home/user/project) or ~ for home directory
modal.dir_will_create_hint: The directory will be created if it doesn't exist.
modal.send_message_hint: Send a message to start a new conversation
modal.continue_in_thread: After selecting, type a message in the thread to continue the conversation

settings.title: Settings
settings.personalization_desc: Configure how {agent} messages appear in your Slack workspace.
settings.message_visibility_desc: Choose which message types to show from agent output. Unselected types won't appear in your Slack workspace.
settings.require_mention_hint: When enabled, the bot only responds when @mentioned in channels (DMs always work).
settings.tip_changes_immediate: You can show/hide message types at any time. Changes apply immediately to new messages.
settings.hidden_messages_note: Hidden messages won't be sent to your IM platform.
settings.opencode_options: OpenCode Options (only applies when backend is OpenCode)
settings.env_vars_restart_note: Changes require OpenCode restart to take effect.
settings.agent_switching_slack_only: Agent switching is currently only available in Slack. Use Slack Agent Settings to configure routing.

cwd.agent_hint: This is where Agent will execute commands
cwd.click_button_hint: Click the 'Change Work Dir' button in the @Vibe Remote /start menu to change working directory.
cwd.use_command_hint:
To change working directory, use:
/set_cwd <path>

Example:
/set_cwd ~/projects/myapp

help.title: Vibe Remote User Guide
help.quick_start_chat: Mention @Vibe Remote to chat with AI
help.feature_resume: Resume Session - Select and resume history conversations
help.feature_cwd: Current Dir / Change Dir - Manage working directory
help.tip_thread: Each Slack thread = independent conversation session
help.tip_parallel: You can open multiple threads to run tasks in parallel
help.tip_quick_stop: Type 'stop' in a thread to quickly stop execution
help.how_persistent: Each chat maintains its own conversation context
help.how_commands: Use @Vibe Remote /start for menu, @Vibe Remote /clear to reset session
help.how_workdir: Change working directory with /set_cwd or via menu
help.how_footer: Just type normally to chat with {agent}!
